blogPost.excerpt: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your team’s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
blogPost.body: End-to-end spend management for companies in LatAm. Issue unlimited physical or virtual cards, set limits for each, get real-time visibility of your team’s spend, and save valuable time on tedious tasks like invoice matching.
blogPost.title: Clara - Clear, simplified spend management for companies in LatAm
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 拉美地区公司的端到端支出管理。发放无限的实体卡或虚拟卡，为每张卡设置限额，实时了解您团队的支出情况，并在发票匹配等繁琐任务上节省宝贵的时间。
localize.tagline: 为拉美地区的公司提供清晰、简化的支出管理。

localize.description: 拉美地區公司的端到端支出管理。發放無限的實體卡或虛擬卡，爲每張卡設置限額，實時瞭解您團隊的支出情況，並在發票匹配等繁瑣任務上節省寶貴的時間。
localize.tagline: 爲拉美地區的公司提供清晰、簡化的支出管理。

previous.excerpt: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated
previous.title: Jooseph - Content curation tool for paid learning paths

localize.description: Jooseph是一个内容策划工具，供课程创建者与受众分享学习路径。- 从网络上的任何链接创建交互式学习路径--接受付费订阅，并赚钱--发布公告，让你的受众得到更新。
localize.tagline: 付费学习路径的内容策划工具

localize.description: Jooseph是一個內容策劃工具，供課程創建者與受衆分享學習路徑。- 從網絡上的任何鏈接創建交互式學習路徑--接受付費訂閱，並賺錢--發佈公告，讓你的受衆得到更新。
localize.tagline: 付費學習路徑的內容策劃工具

next.excerpt: Emoji cloud is a CDN for vector emojies. Search copy and paste vector emojies to your projects in seconds
next.title: Emoji Cloud - A CDN for SVG emoji's

localize.description: Emoji cloud是一个矢量表情的CDN。在几秒钟内搜索复制和粘贴矢量表情符号到您的项目中。
Emoji cloud是一個矢量表情的CDN。在幾秒鐘內搜索複製和粘貼矢量表情符號到您的項目中。
